body:
Hi

I am not able to compile Intel Parallel Studio.

I run `spack install intel-parallel-studio@cluster.2018.4` which results in this error:

```==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:                                                                                                                                                                                        './install.sh' '--silent' 'silent.cfg```
![screenshot from 2019-01-23 12-40-20](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14250760/51625784-0ece9900-1f0c-11e9-833f-54c8268aa822.png)
title: Cannot Compile Intel Parallel Studio
